thread.section_title: Hotel Vic Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Just perfect small hotel
thread.title_full: Just perfect small hotel - Review of Hotel Vic Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JordanZG
title: Just perfect small hotel
text: Very well located, on a peaceful street, but very close to two different metro lines, and 10 min walking distance to Eiffel. In the hotel every detail is well designed. Very calm and quiet atmosphere, excellent bed and pillows, and perfect bathroom. Breakfast is reach and nice. Very pleasant stuff.
